info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 10:44AM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...
St. Francis River at Fisk affecting Butler and Stoddard Counties.
.Heavy rainfall that occurred earlier in the month continues to lead to elevated river levels across the region. Minor flooding is forecast to develop on the Saint Francis river at Fisk this morning.
For the St. Francis River...including Patterson, Fisk...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...St. Francis River at Fisk.
* WHEN...From this morning until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Considerable flooding occurs.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:00 AM CDT Tuesday was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 21.0 feet Friday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
